snippet: The government of Francois Hollande becomes the latest to turn to economic patriotism as a way to bolster industry. But do such efforts contribute to economic revitalization, or are they political gimmicks?
abstract: The government of Francois Hollande becomes the latest to turn to economic patriotism as a way to bolster industry. But do such efforts contribute to economic revitalization, or are they political gimmicks?

headline.main: Can a 'Buy French' Campaign Save French Jobs?
